frontmatter.summary: Gcloud Cheat Sheet with useful commands for gcloud CLI

Getting started.description: Get going with the gcloud command-line tool

commands.name: gcloud cheat-sheet - display gcloud cheat sheet.
gcloud init
commands.description: Initialize, authorize, and configure the gcloud tool.

commands.name: gcloud version
commands.description: Display version and installed components.

commands.name: gcloud components install
commands.description: Install specific components.

commands.name: gcloud components update
commands.description: Update your Google Cloud CLI to the latest version.

commands.name: gcloud config set project
commands.description: Set a default Google Cloud project to work on.

commands.name: gcloud info
commands.description: Display current gcloud tool environment details.

Help.description: Google Cloud CLI is happy to help

commands.name: gcloud help
commands.description: Search the gcloud tool reference documents for specific terms.

commands.name: gcloud feedback
commands.description: Provide feedback for the Google Cloud CLI team.

commands.name: gcloud topic
commands.description: Supplementary help material for non-command topics like accessibility, filtering, and formatting.

Personalization.description: Make the Google Cloud CLI your own; personalize your configuration with properties

commands.name: gcloud config set
commands.description: Define a property (like compute/zone) for the current configuration.

commands.name: gcloud config get
commands.description: Fetch value of a Google Cloud CLI property.

commands.name: gcloud config list
commands.description: Display all the properties for the current configuration.

commands.name: gcloud config configurations create
commands.description: Create a new named configuration.

commands.name: gcloud config configurations list
commands.description: Display a list of all available configurations.

commands.name: gcloud config configurations activate
commands.description: Switch to an existing named configuration.

Credentials.description: Grant and revoke authorization to Google Cloud CLI

commands.name: gcloud auth login
commands.description: Authorize Google Cloud access for the gcloud tool with Google user credentials and set current account as active.

commands.name: gcloud auth activate-service-account
commands.description: Like gcloud auth login but with service account credentials.

commands.name: gcloud auth list
commands.description: List all credentialed accounts.

commands.name: gcloud auth print-access-token
commands.description: Display the current account's access token.

commands.name: gcloud auth revoke
commands.description: Remove access credentials for an account.

commands.name: gcloud projects describe
commands.description: Display metadata for a project (including its ID).

commands.name: gcloud projects add-iam-policy-binding
commands.description: Add an IAM policy binding to a specified project.

Identity & Access Management.description: Configuring Cloud Identity & Access Management (IAM) preferences and service accounts

commands.name: gcloud iam list-grantable-roles
commands.description: List IAM grantable roles for a resource.

commands.name: gcloud iam roles create
commands.description: Create a custom role for a project or org.

commands.name: gcloud iam service-accounts create
commands.description: Create a service account for a project.

commands.name: gcloud iam service-accounts add-iam-policy-binding
commands.description: Add an IAM policy binding to a service account.

commands.name: gcloud iam service-accounts set-iam-policy
commands.description: Replace existing IAM policy binding.

commands.name: gcloud iam service-accounts keys list
commands.description: List a service account's keys.

commands.name: gcloud auth configure-docker
commands.description: Register the gcloud tool as a Docker credential helper.

commands.name: gcloud container clusters create
commands.description: Create a cluster to run GKE containers.

commands.name: gcloud container clusters list
commands.description: List clusters for running GKE containers.

commands.name: gcloud container clusters get-credentials
commands.description: Update kubeconfig to get kubectl to use a GKE cluster.

commands.name: gcloud container images list-tags
commands.description: List tag and digest metadata for a container image.

Virtual Machines & Compute Engine.description: Create, run, and manage VMs on Google infrastructure

commands.name: gcloud compute zones list
commands.description: List Compute Engine zones.

commands.name: gcloud compute instances describe
commands.description: Display a VM instance's details.

commands.name: gcloud compute instances list
commands.description: List all VM instances in a project.

commands.name: gcloud compute disks snapshot
commands.description: Create snapshot of persistent disks.

commands.name: gcloud compute snapshots describe
commands.description: Display a snapshot's details.

commands.name: gcloud compute snapshots delete
commands.description: Delete a snapshot.

commands.name: gcloud compute ssh
commands.description: Connect to a VM instance by using SSH.

Serverless & App Engine.description: Build highly scalable applications on a fully managed serverless platform

commands.name: gcloud app deploy
commands.description: Deploy your app's code and configuration to the App Engine server.

commands.name: gcloud app versions list
commands.description: List all versions of all services deployed to the App Engine server.

commands.name: gcloud app browse
commands.description: Open the current app in a web browser.

commands.name: gcloud app create
commands.description: Create an App Engine app within your current project.

commands.name: gcloud app logs read
commands.description: Display the latest App Engine app logs.

Miscellaneous.description: Commands that might come in handy

commands.name: gcloud kms decrypt
commands.description: Decrypt ciphertext (to a plaintext file) using a Cloud Key Management Service (Cloud KMS) key.

commands.name: gcloud logging logs list
commands.description: List your project's logs.

commands.name: gcloud sql backups describe
commands.description: Display info about a Cloud SQL instance backup.

commands.name: gcloud sql export sql
commands.description: Export data from a Cloud SQL instance to a SQL file.

GCLOUD WIDE FLAGS.description: These flags are available to all commands:

flags.name: --access-token-file
flags.value: Specifies the path to a file containing an OAuth 2.0 access token.

flags.name: --account
flags.value: Specifies the account to use for authentication.

flags.name: --billing-project
flags.value: Sets the billing project to use for operations.

flags.name: --configuration
flags.value: Defines the configuration file to use for the command.

flags.name: --flags-file
flags.value: Points to a file that contains flags to use for the command.

flags.name: --flatten
flags.value: Flattens the output of a command to simplify the structure.

flags.name: --format
flags.value: Specifies the output format (e.g., json, yaml).

flags.name: --help
flags.value: Displays help information for the command.

flags.name: --impersonate-service-account
flags.value: Uses a service account to impersonate for the command execution.

flags.name: --log-http
flags.value: Logs HTTP requests and responses for debugging purposes.

flags.name: --project
flags.value: Sets the Google Cloud project to use for the command.

flags.name: --quiet
flags.value: Suppresses all output except errors and warnings.

flags.name: --trace-token
flags.value: Provides a token for tracing a command in logs.

flags.name: --user-output-enabled
flags.value: Enables user-friendly output in the terminal.

flags.name: --verbosity
flags.value: Controls the verbosity of logging output (e.g., info, debug, error).
